abstract: The purpose of this workshop is improve the understanding and use of precise semantics in OO specifications and designs. The goal is to be a focal point that brings together theoreticians and practitioners to report their experience with making semantics precise, clear, concise and explicit in OO business specifications, business designs, and system specifications. Participants range from from academic researchers to industrial practitioners relating their “war stories.” The workshop continues the tradition of eight previous OOPSLA workshops.

authors.name: Haim Kilov
authors.affiliation: Genesis Development Corporation, Iona Technologies Company

authors.name: Kenneth Baclawski
authors.affiliation: College of Computer Science, Northeastern University, Boston, Massachusetts

title: Ninth OOPSLA workshop on behavioral semantics (poster session)
